code: export var isNumberValid=function isNumberValid(value){var pattern=/^[0-7]*$/;if(!pattern.test(value)){return false;}return value.length<=3;};export var isStringValid=function isStringValid(value){for(var i=0;i<=8;i+=1){if((i===0||i===3||i===6)&&!['r','-',''].includes(value.charAt(i))||(i===1||i===4||i===7)&&!['w','-',''].includes(value.charAt(i))||(i===2||i===5||i===8)&&!['x','-',''].includes(value.charAt(i))){return false;}}return value.length<=9;};
